title: Statement
description: Defines the schema for credit card statements.

accountId.title: Account ID
accountId.description: ID of the account this statement belongs to

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Statement start date (inclusive) in YYYY-MM-DD format

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: Statement end date (inclusive) in YYYY-MM-DD format

startingBalance.title: Starting Balance
startingBalance.description: Balance carried into this statement period in integer minor units

endingBalance.title: Ending Balance
endingBalance.description: Balance at the end of this statement period in integer minor units

totalCharges.title: Total Charges
totalCharges.description: Sum of all charges during the statement period in integer minor units

totalPayments.title: Total Payments
totalPayments.description: Sum of all payments/credits during the statement period in integer minor units

isLocked.title: Is Locked
isLocked.description: Whether the statement is locked for editing
